name: Wizard's Harmony 2
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To download this software, you must also have at least 180MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system's hard disk.
To play this software with your PSP®, the latest system software and a Memory Stick Duo™ with at least 180MB of free space are required.
For more detail information about download to your PSP® system, please see below URL.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.



?Game description
Rather than science, swords and sorcery flourish in this world. Our story takes place at the school of “Skill & Wisdom”, founded for youngsters who long for adventure.

In this game, you will play as an energetic young man who participates in club activities at the “Wizard’s Academy”. But all of a sudden all the other members quitted because of a big mistake made by you in an experiment! The student council, which has never been fond of the club, takes this chance and plans to abolish the club unless you can complete the tasks listed out by them. Now it is up to you to recruit more members to keep the academy going, and at the same time make sure to pass the exam that comes three times a year! Can you save the club and hold it up this time?


?Not compatible with Mouse
